Text: Stagecoach LOI Cc Please find attached the latest version of the Stagecoach LOI I have gone over my changes with Gerald Nemec but will not send this document out to T GP until I have your approval of it Jean is looking over a copy and will be the one signing it before it goes out to TGP In summary the changes were made to the following sections Price float section Article I Section Term and Exclusivity Article II Sections and Let me know if you are comfortable with this latest version of the LOI and I will send it out asap Thanks John

RE LOI StagecoachCan I bring a copy of the Stagecoach LOI on Enron letterhead to you for you r signature Chris Hilgert said that we need your initials or signature including Jean Mrhas Where on the document would you sign or initial I would like to get this out to El Paso today Thanks John

RE Gas AgreementAttached is an example of the how the Stagecoach consumption bands work for power and gas The examples are broken out into main areas Price TrueUps Power and Gas Make Wholes etc Volumetric TrueUps Gas Only There are extensive notes at the bottom of each tab that explain how the trueups work Please let me know if you have any questions Thanks for your help John Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Wednesday April PM To KianiAslani John Meyer Chris Subject Gas Agreement FYI Attached is the draft gas agreement I had forwarded to EES earlier I did not receive a response Forwarded by Gerald NemecHOUECT on PM Gerald Nemec AM To Bo ES cc Andrew nron Christina ES Subject Gas Agreement Bo Attached is the draft of the gas agreement for the StageCoach transaction There are still a few blanks for which Andrew is getting the information Please review and let me know if you have any questions File Master FirmPurchase ECSEESdoc File TA Stagecoachdoc Also to follow up on our discussion from earlier concerning who would actually contracts with the PPL for the Utility Agreement we had earlier discussed Tennessee Gas Pipeline contracting with the Utility with EES acting as their agent for interaction with the Utility However I think it should be EES who contracts with the Utility to receive electric service TGP has contracted with ECS for Compression Services and ECS has contracted with EES for power TGP has no need for a power deal Let me know what you think about this It is my understanding that EES is working on a revised draft of the TA for the Power Contract Let me know if this is not correct Thanks

RE Draft CSA for TGPfor your help we appreciate it JK Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday April PM To KianiAslani John Subject Draft CSA for TGP Attached is the latest draft of the CSA based on our discussion Please forward to the appropriate individuals for review and comment File EP comp agmtdoc

RE Revised CSAproblem JK Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Monday April PM To KianiAslani John Subject Revised CSA John Please disregard the prior version and use this one Thanks File EP comp agmtdoc

RE TGP Docsdo Thanks JK Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday May AM To KianiAslani John Subject TGP Docs John Attached are the OM and the Lease Agreement for the StageCoach Transaction Please review File TGP LEASE AGREEMENTdoc File TGP OPERATIONS AND MAINTENANCE AGREEMENTdoc

Stagecoach Legal Documents Cc Chris Please see the table below that highlights the legal documents needed to close the Stagecoach transaction We will have all of the ECSTGP document s ready for Chris and I to take to the TGP meeting this Friday the numbers i n the compression services agreement will be left blank per G Nemeck un less either of you says otherwise We are having a tough time getting EES lega l to get their docs over to us Seems like a common theme Let me know if you have any questions or comments Regards John

Stagecoach Update Cc Glad to hear that things are underway for the repricing of the Stagecoach power swap As I mentioned earlier we have promised El Paso updated pricing by this Friday We have had the gas swap repriced several times since the power was last updated in late February I believe the last price that we have is Can you please confirm that the following are true and in effect when we are ready to close this deal Have ENA Gas Commodity Structuring group Charlie Weldon update the gas swap bid EES will match the ENA gas bid price Have EES reprice the power swap offer Both power and gas swaps have annualized swing bands of meaning ECS pays the power fixed contract price as long as the Facility does not violate the band on an aggregate annual basis ECS receives the gas fixed contract price as long as the Facility does not violate the band on an aggregate annual basis The following is a list of legal documents between EES and ECS that need to be in place and finalized in order to close this transaction Our target close date is Gerald Nemec our attorney said that the annualized power and gas consumption bands interest payments and monthly power billing should be outlined and explained in the Power and Gas Confirm Agreements Can you please contact EES legal to help get the documents finalized in preparation for closing Can you let me know what their timeframe is Thanks for all of your help John

Stagecoach Compression Services AgreementAttached is an electronic copy of the most recent Stagecoach Compression Services Agreement This version reflects the comments that you made while in San Antonio Please let me know if you have any questions comments or further revisions I will keep you updated on the status of the deal Thanks for your help John

RE QuestionGerald Let me know if you need anything on Stagecoach before I leave this Friday for my trip Andrew will be back on Thursday and is in town the week I am out John Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday May PM To KianiAslani John Subject Re Question John I would be happy to review you No problem John nronXgate PM To Gerald CT cc Subject Question Gerald Would you mind if I put you down as one of my reviewers for PRC Please let me know what you think Thanks John

RE QuestionGerald Let me know if you need anything on Stagecoach before I leave this Friday for my trip Andrew will be back on Thursday and is in town the week I am out John Original Message From Nemec Gerald Sent Tuesday May PM To KianiAslani John Subject Re Question John I would be happy to review you No problem John nronXgate PM To Gerald CT cc Subject Question Gerald Would you mind if I put you down as one of my reviewers for PRC Please let me know what you think Thanks John

Stagecoach Compression Services AgreementAttached is an electronic copy of the most recent Stagecoach Compression Services Agreement This version reflects the comments that you made while in San Antonio Please let me know if you have any questions comments or further revisions I will keep you updated on the status of the deal Thanks for your help John

Stagecoach Update Cc Glad to hear that things are underway for the repricing of the Stagecoach power swap As I mentioned earlier we have promised El Paso updated pricing by this Friday We have had the gas swap repriced several times since the power was last updated in late February I believe the last price that we have is Can you please confirm that the following are true and in effect when we are ready to close this deal Have ENA Gas Commodity Structuring group Charlie Weldon update the gas swap bid EES will match the ENA gas bid price Have EES reprice the power swap offer Both power and gas swaps have annualized swing bands of meaning ECS pays the power fixed contract price as long as the Facility does not violate the band on an aggregate annual basis ECS receives the gas fixed contract price as long as the Facility does not violate the band on an aggregate annual basis The following is a list of legal documents between EES and ECS that need to be in place and finalized in order to close this transaction Our target close date is Gerald Nemec our attorney said that the annualized power and gas consumption bands interest payments and monthly power billing should be outlined and explained in the Power and Gas Confirm Agreements Can you please contact EES legal to help get the documents finalized in preparation for closing Can you let me know what their timeframe is Thanks for all of your help John

Stagecoach Legal Documents Cc Chris Please see the table below that highlights the legal documents needed to close the Stagecoach transaction We will have all of the ECSTGP document s ready for Chris and I to take to the TGP meeting this Friday the numbers i n the compression services agreement will be left blank per G Nemeck un less either of you says otherwise We are having a tough time getting EES lega l to get their docs over to us Seems like a common theme Let me know if you have any questions or comments Regards John

Stagecoach LOI Cc Please find attached the latest version of the Stagecoach LOI I have gone over my changes with Gerald Nemec but will not send this document out to T GP until I have your approval of it Jean is looking over a copy and will be the one signing it before it goes out to TGP In summary the changes were made to the following sections Price float section Article I Section Term and Exclusivity Article II Sections and Let me know if you are comfortable with this latest version of the LOI and I will send it out asap Thanks John

Gas Pricing UpdateCan you please update the gas price for the National Fuel deal in New York Our customer called and would like updated deal economics from us This was the one that was NYMEX INDEX I think that BASIS was and was on the USA side of the border I believe that we dinged the price approx to cents for that In any case I have attached the form with the relevant information Please let me know if you have any questions or need more information Thanks John
Stagecoach ContractHere is the Stagecoach contract that I promised you Let me know if you have any questions Regards John

RE Stagecoach PricingWe are waiting on TGP to hear how their discussions with management have played out Well definitely update you when we get more information Let me know if you have any questions in the meantime Regards John Original Message From Weldon V Charles Sent Thursday May PM To KianiAslani John Miles Andrew Subject Stagecoach Pricing Guys I thought I would just let you know that the latest indicative gas price fo r the Stagecoach deal is Thats down in the last trading da ys How about an update from yalls end on the status of the negotiations etc Thanks Charlie
